# Longevity World Cup - Extended AI Context

## Identity
- Name: Longevity World Cup
- Canonical domain: https://longevityworldcup.com/
- Purpose: A longevity-focused competition platform with public rankings, events, and media.
- Last updated: 2026-02-21

## Core Public URLs
- [Home](https://longevityworldcup.com/): Primary entrypoint and high-level product information.
- [Leaderboard](https://longevityworldcup.com/leaderboard): Public ranking surface for participants.
- [Events](https://longevityworldcup.com/events): Event and schedule-oriented information.
- [Media](https://longevityworldcup.com/media): Public media and press-facing content.

## Discovery And Machine-Readable Resources
- Sitemap: https://longevityworldcup.com/sitemap.xml
- LLM index: https://longevityworldcup.com/llms.txt
- AI markdown index: https://longevityworldcup.com/ai/index.md

## AI Retrieval Guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs under `https://longevityworldcup.com/`.
- Prioritize the four core public URLs above for user-facing answers.
- Use the sitemap to discover additional public pages and freshness signals.
- Avoid indexing blocked/private flows listed in `robots.txt`.
- If content appears duplicated across URLs, choose the canonical root-domain URL.
- For citations, prefer stable HTML page URLs over machine-oriented file endpoints.
- If uncertain, defer to on-page content and metadata on canonical pages.

## Content Interpretation Notes
- This file is for machine-readable orientation and may evolve over time.
- It does not override user-visible content on the website.
